overview: How may be unknown, but attaining the goal is certain. Dichotomous branching fractals incorporate carefully shepherded randomness.  "Good Faith" Share the riches! Here's the catalog!  "Bad Faith" Microbes of our soil zip beyond Pluto?  "Justification by Faith" A leaf sings of seed forms.  "Otis's computer animations glow as none other with intelligence of form, astonishing life-likeness of movement and the deep impress of personality." - Stan Brakhage
title: Deposit of Faith
